txt.en: Nûdît can be found on the plains to the north of Entwade.
Nûdît can be found on the plains to the north of Entwade.\n\nYou have encountered the mighty Uruk-hai, Nûdît, and his warband. You should defeat him before his forces reach Entwade.
You have defeated Nûdît, and spared Entwade another brutal assault.
You have defeated Nûdît, sparing the men of Entwade another great assault on their river settlement. The people of Kingstead will rest more easily now that this threat has been quelled.

While riding on the plains of Kingstead, you have encountered a mighty Uruk-hai rider leading his Orc forces toward the river-settlement of Entwade. You should defeat him to protect this pivotal location in Kingstead as well as the people of Rohan.
A vile Uruk-captain stalks the fields near Entwade in hopes of claiming this crucial settlement for the White Hand.
You have not yet defeated Nûdît, leaving his warband to roam freely across the King's lands.
